title: Did the Tanzanian president test COVID-19 for non-human samples?
subtitle: Articles in the social media claimed that Tanzanian President John Magofoli used samples of fruit, quail and goats to detect illicit testing practices.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: The Tanzanian President John Magofoli secretly sent samples of fruit, fat and goats to a COVID-19 test lab of the human corona virus - the results were positive.
